page.title: 15Games children play
page.content: We were trying to find out the most popular games that people play in the playground or on the school field. We did a survey of all the children in our school and gave them lots of choices of games. Some of these you might not of heard of such as {bulldog, buzz, stuck in the mud. We found that{football}was the most popular game with the boys the second most popular was{rounders},chosen by boys and girls.A lot of girls liked {leapfrog}and{stuck in the mud}and {cricket}. One game you may not have heard of is {Space Invaders}To play you need a ball and at least 3 people.You also need a wall for the background.In the game you have to throw the ball,and if it hits a person then they are out.The winner is the last person left and they become the thrower next time.
